about_the_game:
The game tells the story of Mila, a wolf-dog who wakes up one day in a cold gorge on top of a mountain without remembering how she got there and has to find her way back home, fighting not only against the hordes of monsters that will stand in her way if not also with her own fears and instincts, which will put her to the test in order to achieve her goal.


Back to Home is a game that mixes the best of classic games like castlevania and souls like, with a touch of RPG elements, where the combat is challenging and will make us die over and over again without mercy.
Travel alongside Mila through fantastic lands between ancient frozen caves, sinister swamps and deep lakes drawn by hand in a “dirty-pixel art” style.

Characteristics


  • Brutal Combat: Slay enemies with the power of your mighty claws, or unleash devastating new special moves to annihilate the threats that come your way.
  • Non Linear: Freely explore the vast world among forgotten paths, and mysterious places through which you will find your way home.
  • Epic Boss Battles: Going home is tough and in order to make it you'll have to defeat particular giant and ominous creatures that will try to stop you. Study and learn their movements to achieve victory over them.
  • Search and find: The world is full of hidden treasures, some will undoubtedly support you on your journey and thanks to Mila's refined sense of smell you will be able to get hold of some to make your journey more bearable.
  • Lean on your Dog Tags: Plates that provide strange powers and abilities. Choose them well to be even more powerful!
